attributes.action: not let any other sport except athletics to occupy the London 2012 Olympic Stadium
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The U.K has many football grounds. But in comparison the U.K does not have enough athletics stadiums. If after the 2012 Olympics the stadium comes down in size to 25,000 it would be the perfect place to hold athletics meets. It could also eventually be feautured in the new Diamond League. The stadium would become the home of athletics in the U.K
